definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: We have both consomme and cream soups.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏有清湯和濃湯。

sentences.english: He treated himself to a cup of bouillon from a restaurant nearby .
sentences.chinese: 他在附近的一家餐館裏喝了一杯牛肉清湯。

sentences.english: Green tea has the characteristics of "green leaves in a clear soup with a strong astringent taste ".
sentences.chinese: 綠茶的“綠葉在一個清湯具有強烈澀味特色”。

sentences.english: I want a cook who can make good broth and cabbages.
sentences.chinese: 我要一位能做好的清湯，善燒青菜的好廚子。

sentences.english: Which soup do you prefer, the plain soup or the cream soup?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡哪一種湯，清湯還是濃湯？

sentences.english: Would you like some clear soup or thick soup?
New Zealand deep sea Scampi consommé, truffle and scallop ravioli, tomato.
sentences.chinese: 新西蘭深海螯蝦清湯，黑菌和扇貝餃子，番茄。

sentences.english: I recommend consomme and cream of chicken .
sentences.chinese: 今天的清湯和奶油雞湯很好。

sentences.english: I'd like steak and a clear soup.
Do you prefer a consommé or a cream soup?
sentences.chinese: 您喜歡清湯還是奶油湯？

sentences.english: A： Perhaps I could recommend mushroom soup and clear soup.
sentences.chinese: 也許我可以推薦清燉冬菇和清湯。

sentences.english: New Zealand deep sea Scampi consommé, truffle and scallop ravioli , tomato.
sentences.chinese: 新西蘭深海螯蝦清湯，黑菌和扇貝餃子，番茄。

sentences.english: One consomme, and one cream of chicken, please.
When choosing a soup, keep in mind that cream-based soups are higher in fat and calories than broth-based soups.
sentences.chinese: 點湯時，謹記奶油湯的脂肪和熱量比清湯高。

sentences.english: Which soup do you prefer, the plain soup or the creanm soup ?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡哪一種湯，清湯還是濃湯？

definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
noodles served with soy sauce/sesame butter etc
